parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> TKOH

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> RTD

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name> game2</name>=<value> arma 3

</value></part><part><name>version2</name>=<value>1.34

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>Returns the current position of a helicopter's collective pitch control.
* 0: fully lowered
* 1: fully raised 
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>afm</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[collectiveRTD]] helicopterRTD

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> helicopterRTD: [[ObjectRTD]] - helicopter

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_collective = [[collectiveRTD]] [[vehicle]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setActualCollectiveRTD]]
</value></part></template>

[[Category:Scripting Commands]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
